title: Web Development
subtitle: Full-stack web applications
description: Custom web applications built with modern technologies like React, Next.js, Node.js, and PostgreSQL. From concept to deployment, I create responsive, scalable solutions tailored to your business needs.

title: Mobile App Development
subtitle: iOS and Android applications
description: Cross-platform mobile apps using React Native and Expo. Deliver seamless user experiences on both iOS and Android with a single codebase, reducing development time and costs.

title: API Development
subtitle: RESTful and GraphQL APIs
description: Robust, scalable backend APIs with comprehensive documentation. Expertise in Node.js, Express, GraphQL, authentication, rate limiting, and integration with third-party services.

title: Database Design
subtitle: Efficient data architecture
description: Design and optimize database schemas for performance and scalability. Experience with PostgreSQL, MongoDB, and Prisma ORM. Includes migration strategies and query optimization.

title: Cloud Deployment
subtitle: AWS, Azure, and more
description: Deploy and manage applications on cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, and Vercel. Set up CI/CD pipelines, monitoring, and automated backups for reliable production environments.

title: UI/UX Consulting
subtitle: User-centered design
description: Create intuitive, accessible user interfaces that delight users. Conduct user research, design wireframes and prototypes, and implement responsive designs with modern CSS frameworks.
